channel.title: Help with running a script
channel.description:
OK so im new to arayn and I need help running scripts! I use 367 and it came with a couple awsome scripts but when I click file then run it says "type in your command""include the /" (or was it !)
when I typed /walker (or was it !walker) it didint do anything...I thought using the scripts name would help lol
so can someone help me? Im a noob at arayn...

item.title: Help with running a script
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

use
/walker()
/rminePower(copper)
/dnetBank()

just look in the scripts folder in same folder as run.bat!!

Read full topic
